summary: The customer is interested in purchasing a TV from Contoso Wireless and asked the agent about their product, warranty, discount options, customer support, and financing options. The agent informed the customer that the TVs come with high definition resolution, 4K Ultra HD, and a built-in streaming service. They also offer a one-year limited warranty and an extended warranty for an additional fee. Customers can receive a 10% discount on the extended warranty if purchased with the TV. Contoso Wireless offers 24/7 customer support via phone, email, and live chat. They also offer 0% interest financing for up to 24 months if the customer qualifies. The agent recommended considering an HDMI cable and sound bar when purchasing a TV to enhance the viewing experience and offered discounts when these items are purchased together with the TV.
